ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bravura Nerf HIT
ygData.msgSnippet: It s not exactly 6 levels higher than you... it s some equation like lvl + 5 OR 1.2 x lvl = resist cap whichever is higher. At level 40, you have the
ygData.messageBody:
It's not exactly 6 levels higher than you... it's some equation like

lvl + 5 OR 1.2 x lvl = resist cap whichever is higher.

At level 40, you have the possibility of charming something as high as level
48.

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony


----- Original Message -----
From: "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 18, 2000 3:25 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bravura Nerf HIT


> Easy: You can't charm something 6 levels higher than you ;)
> hehe it's an internal caster cap. Nobody can effect stuff more than 5 or
6
> levels above them ;)
>
> Therefore: Level 50 bard attempts charm, mob resists every time, mob is
> over 55
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Miriana" <miriana@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, April 18, 2000 12:32 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bravura Nerf HIT
>
>
> > On Tue, 18 Apr 2000 kim@... wrote:
> >
> > > Just to clarify, I have no problem with it being capped at 49.
> > > I was just disputing the logic in your previous message saying
> > > the ubermobs would be upgraded in level once Kunark comes out.
> > > If they are, then the complaints about our charm being too
> > > powereful were unfounded because we were using a
> > > post-expansion song on pre-expansion mobs.
> > >
> >
> > Hrm, this brings up an interesting question for myself. If the
> > old bard charm wasn't capped, how did my guildmates know what level
> > certain mobs were...
> >
> > <thinks there's some showeq stuff going on>
> >
> > In any case the point is moot, since bards can't charm anything in
> > sky anymore, except for maybe npc pets.
> >
> > --
> > Miriana
> > Legions of Darkness
> > Innoruuk Server
> >
